summary: FSS - The Moving Day Ring.  You CAN take it with you.
descriptionHtml:
Everything is for sale my friend, everything!  But can you carry it?

The Moving Day Ring will let you take it with you.

Did you just buy a new house?  Do you have more stuff crammed into it than a giant could carry?

The Moving Day Ring will let you move it to your new castle.

----

The Moving Day Ring is a cheat item that will let you carry 50000lbs of equipment.
Currently it is not placed in the game and must be consoled.

---

Installation and Usage:

Drop .esp in your Skyrim/Data folder.  Enable in launcher.
To get the ring in game you will need to open the console (usually the ~ key)
The exact code you need to enter will depend on how many mods you have.
So type the following into the console \"help moving 0\".  This will tell you the exact
item code.  In my case it was 07001000, so the command to give myself the ring was
\"player.additem 07001000 1\".  And now I, and you, can move everything you own from
Whiterun to Solitude in one trip.  (I hope you can do it in one trip.)

Enjoy! :D
author: FuzzySockSucker
